channel.title: GPT-4 on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in GPT-4 on FinanClub

item.title: What Is ChatGPT? What to Know About the AI Chatbot
item.description: ChatGPT is an artificial intelligence (AI) chatbot developed by OpenAI and released in November 2022. It is built on top of OpenAI’s GPT-3.5 and GPT-4 foundational large language models (LLMs) and has been fine-tuned using both supervised and reinforcement learning techniques ^1.
